review: Hi its pratima Singh.my twins were delivered by dr.nirmal gujrati sir.the best thing about him is that he understands patients.always available to them.call him anytime and he is always there to help you.i will strongly say if you have any issues please visit him once.you wont be disappointed.

It was a great experience.  His time to time advice were very helpful.  Whenever called he was there for us.  This humbleness and willing to help genuinely great.  Thanks Dr.Nirmal for your support and help.  Its was our pleasure to have a Doctor like you.  Thank you!
reply_text: Thanks a lot Karan for valuable feedback!

review:
Despite the unusual circumstances of going through and having abnormal uterus, he made me feel at ease throughout the entire duration of 2 months since I am meeting him. 
He has always been very responsive to all my questions and addressing all my concerns in a calm and timely manner and most important always available to solve your queries on whatsapp or call.
He is thorough professional focuses exactly to the issue and the results are awesome.I highly recommend him for the Gynec issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Nirmal is very meticulous, very hard working, *************, cool & calm doctor. He makes sure that he is always available for his Patients 24X7 and also in case of emergency time. His approach & decision making during critical time is highly commendable, which makes him truly qualified professional. I highly recommend him with 5 star (*****) rating.
****** ****** ********  ** ***** ** ********* ******** very helpful, patient feel comfortable and get right guideline and took personal part for cure the disease.
